name: Tetsoidea Eternal
description:
Follow Evelyn and company in this delightful RPG to determine the whereabouts of the other heroes of the realm of Tetsoidea. Engage in difficult encounters, easy encounters, and laughable encounters. Travel through a variety of settings. Talk to people, horses, and dogs. Do whatever you feel like, so long as you vanquish the evil
that has spread throughout the land. The main quest is approximately 2-3 hours long, spanning 35+ different maps. This is an old-school styled RPG flavored with strange humor, fast-paced turn based combat, and a wide variety of abilities to take down your foes with.
